title: Strictly's Alex Scott drops Neil Jones on his head after 13 hour training session
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing's Alex Scott dropped her partner Neil Jones on his head after spending 13 hours in training for their next performance.

The moment was caught on camera as the pair went over the steps for their energetic Charleston in time for Saturday night.

In one jaw dropping move, Neil was suspended upside down with Alex supporting him by the waist when she lost her grip.

Professional Neil came crashing down head first on to the mat.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The incident happened just after Alex joked to fans her body was 'giving up on her' after putting in 13 hours of practise in one go.

Alex collapsed to the ground herself earlier in the night after jumping off one of their props.

The former footballer admitted she and Neil were doing all they could to avoid being in the bottom two after last week's surprise eviction.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

But luckily Neil appeared to take his tumble in good spirits as he emerged unscathed and laughed at Alex's clumsiness.

The pair had looked concern they could be leaving the competition on Sunday night's results after their Tango to Fleetwood Mac's Go Your Own Way earned them a score of 23.

The routine failed to impress the judges and the duo found themselves at the bottom of the leaderboard.

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

But it was Dev Griffin and partner Dianne Buswell who were given their marching orders after being unanimously voted off by the judges.

The decision shocked viewers who thought the pair deserved longer in the competiton. Both Dev and Dianne were visibly upset on the night, with the professional dancer unable to complete the 'last dance.'

A week before their dance-off, Dianne and Dev were dealt another blow.

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

(Image: Instagram)

Red-head Dianne was rushed to hospital when Dev dropped her in rehearsal and sent her crashing to the ground.

Thankfully, there was no serious damage and doctors at North London’s Barnet Hospital discharged Dianne after diagnosing her with whiplash.

The pair were able to carry on and perform on Movie week but were voted off just one week after.
description: The pair have become the second act in two weeks to suffer a horror fall after Dev Griffin dropped his partner Dianne Buswell from 8ft in the air
